import logo from './logo.svg'; import {useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {BrowserRouter as Router,Routes, Route, NavLink,useNavigate, Navigate} from 'react-router-dom'; import './App.css'; import Login from './components/Customer/Login' import Homepage from './components/Customer/Homepage' import Profile from './components/Customer/Profile' import Cart from './components/Customer/Cart' import Orders from './components/Customer/Orders' import Checkout from './components/Customer/Checkout' import Home from './components/Retail/Home'; import ManageOrder from './components/Retail/ManageOrder'; import ManageDiscount from './components/Retail/ManageDiscount'; function App() { const [isLogin,setLogin] = useState(true); const [user,setUser] = useState(null); const [LoginType,setLoginType] = useState('') console.log("login ",isLogin) console.log("type",LoginType ) useEffect(() => { setLogin(!isLogin) },[user]) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleLogin = (event) => { event.preventDefault() let {uid,pass} = document.forms[0] Login({uid: uid.value, pass: pass.value}) setUser(sessionStorage.getItem("user")) console.log("TYPE",LoginType) if(user!=null){ if(LoginType === 'Customer'){ console.log("cust") navigate("/Customer/Home") } else{ console.log("ret") navigate("/Retail/Home") } } } const handleLogout = (event) => { event.preventDefault() sessionStorage.removeItem("user") setUser(null) } const handleLoginType = (ele) => { setLoginType(ele) } return (
{isLogin ? <> {LoginType === 'Customer' ? <> Logout Profile Home Cart Orders : <> Logout Home Manage Orders Manage Discounts } } /> } /> } /> } /> }/> }/> }/> }/> } /> : <>

Welcome to MeriBasket

Login As {LoginType}

handleLoginType("Customer")}/> handleLoginType("Retail")}/>






}
) } export default App;
